token_info.name: How to materialize a conversation - Postcard from
token_info.description: *Como materializar uma conversa. This photographic work is part of the Brutal Matter: (Assuntos Brutos:) serie of works.  Photography from 2017, 3D object from 2021, by Brutas Collective, a brazilian contemporary art collective formed by Erica Storer, Estelle Flores, Gio Soifer, JÃ©ssica Luz and Pac Calory. px twitter @BrutasColetivo
